feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:51 a.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 9:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 6 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 6.3°C
Wind: ENE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a
